alert.title: Use only smartphone!
alert.intro: Use VPN and incognito mode in your browser even on smartphone. Read the guide using link:
alert.point-2: Do not ask for any SMS during ID verificatio in Veriff!
alert.warning: Veriff will ask you to send sms or scan QR code when you use device without sim card! Choose QR code in any case for your safety.
